Articles.Content:
Hello, everyone!

I was thinking of doing a new series in which I attempt to complete an Apollo-style Mun mission entirely in IVA, with several mods that will make it more interesting. I recorded this first episode to see if there's interest, but I want to make sure someone will be watching before dedicating the time to it, since I already have two active series. I consider this episode to be sort of a prologue, it's more of a demonstration of the concept, but let me know what you think! I'd love to keep trying, since the ultimate goal is just beyond my current abilities.
